scenario.name: Register and call 8888
scenario.send: REGISTER sip:6001@[remote_ip]:[remote_port] SIP/2.0 Via: SIP/2.0/[transport] [local_ip]:[local_port];branch=[branch] Max-Forwards: 70 From: <sip:6001@[remote_ip]>;tag=[call_number] To: <sip:6001@[remote_ip]> Call-ID: reg-[pid]-[call_number]@[local_ip] CSeq: 1 REGISTER Contact: <sip:6001@[local_ip]:[local_port];transport=[transport]> Expires: 120 Content-Length: 0

INVITE sip:[service]@[remote_ip]:[remote_port] SIP/2.0 Via: SIP/2.0/[transport] [local_ip]:[local_port];branch=[branch] Max-Forwards: 70 From: <sip:6001@[remote_ip]>;tag=[call_number] To: <sip:[service]@[remote_ip]> Contact: <sip:6001@[local_ip]:[local_port];transport=[transport]> Call-ID: call-[pid]-[call_number]@[local_ip] CSeq: 1 INVITE Allow: ACK, BYE, CANCEL, INVITE, OPTIONS, REGISTER, INFO, UPDATE Supported: timer, replaces Content-Type: application/sdp Content-Length: [len]
v=0 o=- 0 0 IN IP4 [local_ip] s=- c=IN IP4 [local_ip] t=0 0 m=audio [media_port] RTP/AVP 0 101 a=rtpmap:0 PCMU/8000 a=rtpmap:101 telephone-event/8000 a=fmtp:101 0-16 a=sendrecv

ACK sip:[service]@[remote_ip]:[remote_port] SIP/2.0 Via: SIP/2.0/[transport] [local_ip]:[local_port];branch=[branch] Max-Forwards: 70 From: <sip:6001@[remote_ip]>;tag=[call_number] To: <sip:[service]@[remote_ip]> Call-ID: call-[pid]-[call_number]@[local_ip] CSeq: 1 ACK Content-Length: 0

BYE sip:[service]@[remote_ip]:[remote_port] SIP/2.0 Via: SIP/2.0/[transport] [local_ip]:[local_port];branch=[branch] Max-Forwards: 70 From: <sip:6001@[remote_ip]>;tag=[call_number] To: <sip:[service]@[remote_ip]> Call-ID: call-[pid]-[call_number]@[local_ip] CSeq: 2 BYE Content-Length: 0

REGISTER sip:6001@[remote_ip]:[remote_port] SIP/2.0 Via: SIP/2.0/[transport] [local_ip]:[local_port];branch=[branch] Max-Forwards: 70 From: <sip:6001@[remote_ip]>;tag=[call_number] To: <sip:6001@[remote_ip]> Call-ID: reg-[pid]-[call_number]@[local_ip] CSeq: 2 REGISTER Contact: <sip:6001@[local_ip]:[local_port];transport=[transport]> Expires: 0 Content-Length: 0
